content.en: Traffic prediction: Deep learning algorithms are being used to accurately predict traffic flows in the short-term. These algorithms capture the complex patterns and dependencies in traffic data, allowing for more accurate predictions. Additionally, deep learning models show promise in improving the accuracy of traffic flow prediction, especially when combined with other deep learning methods. Overall, deep learning-based techniques are proving to be effective in predicting road traffic and have the potential to greatly improve traffic management and planning.
content.da: Trafikprognose: Deep learning-algoritmer bruges til nøjagtigt at forudsige trafikstrømme på kort sigt. Disse algoritmer fanger de komplekse mønstre og afhængigheder i trafikdataene, hvilket muliggør mere præcise forudsigelser. Derudover viser deep learning-modeller lovende resultater i forbedring af nøjagtigheden af trafikstrømsforudsigelser, især når de kombineres med andre deep learning-metoder. Overordnet set viser deep learning-baserede teknikker sig at være effektive til at forudsige vejtrafik og har potentiale til i høj grad at forbedre trafikstyring og planlægning.
